name: Sluggy Jean Takes A Hike (itch)
description:
You ever had an idea that you knew would just... stick?

Well, with Sluggy Jean Takes A Hike,  the sticking is done by him! Sluggy Jean Takes A Hike is a puzzle-platformer game about a slug. Follow him as He follows the light!

The controls are as told by the screen, have fun! and if you find a bug, feel free to comment so we can increase the quality of our game!
